title: Karthus emote bug
body: I can't hear Karthus's jokes, laughs, or taunts when I use them.  I'm not sure if the enemy can still hear them.  Jokes, laughs, and taunts work on other champions I play so I know it is not an issue on my side.

replies.body:
Heya! 

Thanks for the report! This is an issue with all of his VO. D: We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
